job_summary: HiLo is seeking a highly motivated Technical Support Engineer to join our team and provide specialized support to our enterprise customers. The ideal candidate will possess technical expertise with scripting, excellent software skills, and a proactive approach to customer support. In addition, we highly value candidates with practical know-how, gained from experience in fields such as agriculture, trades, or similar industries.

Your primary functions will include talking to customers about our ICT offering and assisting our sales team in the region. You will work closely with senior members of the team to identify customer requirements and achieve the best possible outcome for the customer.  We will provide full training on the latest Cloud solutions.

Exciting opportunity for an IT Service Manager to join the Digital team and lead the IT Service Management function. This is a hands on role and in this role, you will own the service delivery management, service improvement, incident and problem management, budget management, compliance and security. You will also be a specialist in managing infrastructure services, including cloud and network technologies.

This role will also facilitate service management activities, ensuring that outcomes, risks and issues are effectively communicated between stakeholders. This role is responsible for managing and monitoring key performance indicators for our internal and external suppliers/partners.
